content: As soon as the land of any country has all become private property, the landlords, like all other men, love to reap where they never sowed, and demand a rent even for its natural produce.
translations: ita:Non appena la terra di qualunque paese è diventata tutta di proprietà privata, i proprietari terrieri, come tutti gli al
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
